marklogic.body: I've been playing it all weekend, and it's just brilliant... The best bits of S/S and B/O combined, not as 'twitchy' as either of those, so you can drift and smash / slam into things without fear of instant wreck! City editor is fun with online challenges... I really love racers, and this is definitely the best since S/S I think this review is Spot-on... And it's TOUGH! Nothing worse than an easy racer (NFS: Hot Pursuit for example) Just great fun and great mechanics, only wish it had custom soundtracks.. but hell, turn the music Off and pump your own tunes through your speakers and it's perfect...
